Flow.description: Changed to Look for Account model
Flow.label: NewCommunityUser

fields.name: DispCompleted
fields.fieldText:
Please check your email:


{!GetSelectedContact.Email}

{!EmailNewContact.value}

{!Get_Account.Email}


to complete your registration

fields.name: DispMsg
fields.fieldText:
After completing this form, you will get an email to finish creating an account in our system.


You must set a password and then log in to continue with your application.

fields.name: DispFirstScreen
fields.fieldText: Type the email address of the client

fields.name: DispError
fields.fieldText:
We encounter this error {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

Please click next to try again

fields.name: DispExt
fields.fieldText:
You already have an account in the system, your username is {!UsernameFormulaCheck}


log in at https://wecanride.my.site.com/client/s/login/

fields.name: DispNoLicenses
fields.fieldText: Please contact the We Can Ride Office to create an account.

fields.name: disp
fields.fieldText: In keeping with our veterinarian's recommendations, WCR has weight limits based on height and weight. If the client is over the limit, they may be appropriate for groundwork lessons. Please continue to fill out the paperwork if you are interested in groundwork (working with the horse on the ground). Please reach out to clients@wecanride.org with any questions.

fields.name: DispContacts
fields.fieldText: Select your name from the list below, if your name is not there select "New Contact" to create an account.
